arts.ttl: Juve aiming to keep the momentum going in Verona
arts.sum: The Bianconeri have scored in 13 official matches at Verona, with a total of 21 goals; their last defeat came on April 30, 2000, in Serie A, when Verona beat Juventus 2-0 with a brace from Fabrizio Cammarata. Zaolo Zanetti and Igor Tudor have met twice before, with the current Bianconeri coach winning both matches in the 2021/22 Serie A doubleheader between Venezia and Verona.
